item.title: VILLA LAGO
item.dc:creator: Takudzwa

item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Villa Lago!

Stunning brand new modern lakefront home with high ceilings, open concept, abundance of natural light coming through the Floor-to-Ceiling impact windows throughout, 24,600 sq ft lot, including the slope of the land and portion that extends into the lake. From the impressive & elegant double-height foyer with a second floor catwalk, admire this spacious 5,603 sq ft home with 5 suites.
2 suites on the 1 floor with a living, dining, family & guest powder room. A large master bedroom, bathroom, walking closet & balcony with an extraordinary view of the lake is on the 2nd floor with another 2 suites & a large loft.
ALL ROOMS HAVE LAKE VIEW.

INQUIRE FOR NIGHTLY RATE
